scripts.build: npm run typecheck && vite build && node scripts/build-manifest.mjs
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run build
scripts.zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../foundry-tabletop-helpers.zip .
scripts.tarball: npm run build && mkdir -p build && tar -czvf build/foundry-tabletop-helpers-dev.tar.gz -C dist .
scripts.link:foundry: node -e "const p=require('node:path'); const os=require('node:os'); const fs=require('node:fs'); const mod=p.resolve('dist'); const data=p.join(os.homedir(), 'AppData','Local','FoundryVTT','Data','modules'); if(!fs.existsSync(data)) fs.mkdirSync(data,{recursive:true}); const link=p.join(data,'foundry-tabletop-helpers'); try{fs.rmSync(link,{recursive:true,force:true});}catch{}; fs.symlinkSync(mod, link, 'junction'); console.log('Linked:', link, '->', mod);"
